metadata.title: USN-6141-1 -- xfce4-settings vulnerability
metadata.description: Robin Peraglie and Johannes Moritz discovered that xfce4-settings incorrectly parsed quoted input when processed through xdg-open. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to inject arbitrary arguments into the default browser or file manager.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6141-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xfce4-helpers - 4.16.2-1ubuntu2.22.10.1 xfce4-settings - 4.16.2-1ubuntu2.22.10.1 No subscription required
